name: JavaTestBridgeForTestPlan
friendlyName: Test Plan association for Java tests
description: Associate Java tests results to Test Plan items
helpMarkDown: This task allows you to associate Java method tests to Test Plan work items, it creates a dynamic .NET library that can be used to read the Java test result during a Test Plan execution. This task must be executed after a Maven build and expects the test results to be in the form TEST-ClassName.MethodName.xml. You need to provide a JSON that maps each java test with a test plan workitem (ID)
author: Gianluca Bertelli

inputs.name: testResultPath
inputs.label: Java test results folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The folder that contains the tests results (the test result files must be in the form **TEST-ClassName.MethodName.xml**)

inputs.name: outputFolder
inputs.label: Output folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target folder where to save the created DLL. The DLL must be discoverable by the test agent.

inputs.name: inputType
inputs.label: Input type
inputs.helpMarkDown: How to pass the JSON mapping

inputs.name: jsonMapping
inputs.label: JSON test mapping
inputs.helpMarkDown: The JSON string that map each Java test with a Test Item ID. Properties for each item: **className**, **methodName**, **workItemID**. The string must be escaped like: *[{\"className\": \"HelloWorldJava.Demo.HelloWorldJunitTest\",\"methodName\": \"testUI\",\"workItemID\": 216}]*

inputs.name: jsonMappingFile
inputs.label: JSON test mapping file
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file that contains the JSON mapping.  Properties for each item: **className**, **methodName**, **workItemID**
